title: The Real Purpose
body:
The real purpose of our little experiment was - as mentioned before - to get more resources. Not the most noble of reasons, but it's necessary.
             Besides, the scans haven't revealed any intelligent life; so we're not technically harming anyone.
             But still, that was the true purpose of our experiment. Not the noble space-faring, peaceful reasons we've told everyone. - Dr. Wynter, Log #12
